code: |
  function acosh (arg) {
    //  discuss at: http://phpjs.org/functions/acosh/
    // original by: Onno Marsman
    //   example 1: acosh(8723321.4);
    //   returns 1: 16.674657798418625

    return Math.log(arg + Math.sqrt(arg * arg - 1))
  }
